main event: A pilot observed a bright, round, silver-colored object moving smoothly toward the east over West Palm Beach, Florida on 16 July 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately one minute., The object was blue-white in color., It disappeared suddenly at an altitude of about 3,000 feet., The observer was Captain Jack E. Reed, a USAF pilot., The sighting had a reliability rating of very good.
witness description: Jack E. Reed, Capt. USAF, with a very good reliability rating
